Description: Bust of Victory right. Border of dots. (obverse)
Lion walking right; below, inscription; above, inscription; on left, inscription; on right, inscription. Border of dots. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Republic Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Republic
